short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser into a peaceful, snow-covered wonderland.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Offers a serene winter landscape of a snow-laden path surrounded by frosted trees, with gentle sunlight filtering through. The wooden fence along the path invites you into a magical, quiet scene that captures the essence of a tranquil winter morning. Perfect for creating a calming and refreshing browsing experience.
